data: The music industry consists of the individuals and organizations that earn money by writing songs and musical compositions, creating and selling recorded music and sheet music, presenting concerts, as well as the organizations that aid, train, represent and supply music creators.
filmData: The South African film industry is one of the fastest growing and most high-tech, vibrant industry, with international filmmakers holling in on some of South Africa's breathtaking locations, low production costs and government tax rebates. This sector hold a great potential in contributing to local economy in the form of employment, skills development, cash flow and tourism.
